pages.text: Vanquisher is a rutheless pirate ship, carrying a whopping 22 cannons on board. Picking a fight with this ship is a terrible idea, as many other ships have found out the hard way.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Absolute Overkill/$$(br)Vanquisher $(l)targets a tile/$ and fires all 22 cannons at once, $(l)absolutely obliterating anything present in that tile/$. This ability has $(l)1 Use/$ and costs $(l)16 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/suppression)$(l)Wildfire/$$(br)$(l)As vanquisher sinks/$, the crew tries its best to avenge the ship, wildly firing its cannons and $(l)damaging 8 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
